companyName: iPath Bloomberg Cocoa Subindex Total Return SM IndexETN
description:
The investment seeks to provide investors with exposure to the Jones-UBS Cocoa Subindex Total ReturnService Mark. 
The Dow Jones-UBS Cocoa Subindex Total ReturnService Mark (the "index") reflects the returns that are potentially available through an unleveraged investment in the futures contracts on cocoa. The index currently consists of one futures contract on the commodity of cocoa which is included in the Dow Jones-UBS Commodity Index Total ReturnService Mark.
